title: Shadows of the Past: A Shadow Slayers Story (Shadow Slayers Stories)
features: A powerful enemy lurks in the shadows of her past. An enemy that could destroy her…and the world.

Josie Benson’s peaceful life is shattered when frightening nightmares begin to haunt her. Then, when a mysterious package arrives on her doorstep, it sends her on a wild adventure of discovery that takes her to a gothic estate on rocky coast of Maine and propels her into the fight of her life.Leaving friends and family behind, she follows a magical stranger who promises her answers, but she finds herself face to face with a supernatural adversary. Will she be able to stop him from robbing her of everything, or will his dark power be her undoing?
If you like spooky settings, supernatural suspense, and epic battles between good and evil, you’ll love this first book in Nellie H. Steele’s mystery-filled contemporary fantasy series.
Scroll up and discover Josie’s secret today!

From the Author
Shadows of the Past
is book one in the Shadow Slayers series, a suspenseful mystery series with a supernatural twist.  The series follows a group of friends who work together to keep darkness at bay.  Book 2,
Stolen Portrait Stolen Soul
, is available now in Kindle Unlimited and paperback!
Gone
, Book 3 in the series, will be available Summer 2021!Fun fact from Nellie:
Dark Shadows
is one of my favorite TV shows!  It heavily influenced my imagination and I hope this book follows in the grand tradition of that show!
About the Author

Nellie H. Steele lives in the South Hills of Pittsburgh with her family and her many fur-babies. When she isn't writing, she enjoys teaching Statistics at a local university or watching her dogs and cats play in the yard.Nellie is the author of the Cate Kensie Mystery Series, a cozy mystery series following the adventures of Dr. Catherine Kensie, a history professor turned Scottish Countess, and her beloved dog, Riley, and the Shadow Slayers series, a supernatural suspenseful mystery series following a group of friends who work together to keep the darkness at bay.Check out all Nellie offers at anovelideapublishing.com/novels, sign up for our newsletter to get the latest news about book releases or like us on facebook (facebook.com/anovelideapublishing) to keep up with us!
